meanings.sent1: The posties bring letters to our homes every day.
meanings.sent2: I saw the posties walking along the street with their mail bags.
meanings.sent3: The posties must have strong legs from all that walking!
meanings.sent4: The posties are like modern-day messengers, spreading news far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The posties wear uniforms and carry important letters in their bags.

meanings.sent1: I appreciate the posties for their hard work in delivering our mail.
meanings.sent2: The posties start their rounds early in the morning to ensure timely delivery.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world without posties - no more mail surprises!
meanings.sent4: The posties move swiftly through the neighborhood, like silent mail fairies.
meanings.sent5: The posties diligently complete their rounds, rain or shine.

meanings.definition: A slang term for postal workers.
meanings.sent1: The posties at our local post office are always friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: My uncle used to be one of the posties in our town.
meanings.sent3: The posties have a secret handshake to identify each other.
meanings.sent4: In the world of mail delivery, the posties are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The posties work tirelessly to ensure our packages and letters reach us safely.
